title: lol katarina can fucking what?
body:
short summery for the battle academia skins found on surrender@20

 "Katarina is a rough-edged loner who stays far away from the politics of Durandal Academy. A 2nd year student with a chip on her shoulder, she is also a top member of the Assassin Club-- _**the only club on campus allowed to kill opponents in school-sanctioned duels.**_ Few other students ever dare approach her."

_**the only club on campus allowed to kill opponents in school-sanctioned duels.**_ 

thats the most unfair shit ive ever read. puts everyone vs the assassins at a disadvantage since they have to hold back to ensure they dont kill their opponents and assassin club gets a free pass?

my child will **NOT** be attending this school. 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}

replies.body:
It's not League of Legends. It's supposed to be a battle school. A SCHOOL. Allowing one club to kill their opponents is just messy and it sounds incompetent of them.

EDIT: Reread this. Are you talking about the gameplay? Because otherwise OP's still right. Assassins shouldn't get this many advantages in school, that just makes it terribly unfun.
HE's making a joke fam
I figured after I reread it. My point still stands, but I apologize. I am terrible at reading humor.

Tbh I think it just feels completely out of place and tacked-on to be edgy. As far as Im concerned Im not considering it canon, so I'm just ignoring it, as as far as we see no other part of the skinline is just randomly grim like that
I mean it's based on anime, which I can't exactly think of an anime that allows a student to commit murder, but if there were one I wouldn't be surprised or question it.
Allow me to introduce you to Assassination Classroom.  Where a whole class of kids are trained to be assassins.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-05-01T21:05:23.989+0000)
>
> Allow me to introduce you to Assassination Classroom.  Where a whole class of kids are trained to be assassins.

I definitely don't think you've watched that show if that's what you compare to what I said xD. A club being able to kill students vs. a rogue class up on a hill trying to kill a...okay that's kinda spoilers, either way, no.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-01T21:28:07.303+0000)
>
> An alien monster who blew up the moon isn't spoilers~ 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> And it was kind of a joke.  I mean I think it's implied... actually spoilers blegh.

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
Plot twist that's just image archive from school shooting.
Assassination classroom

> [{quoted}](name=Hi im a Cat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-01T20:03:26.855+0000)
>
> Assassination classroom

but they dont kill the teacher or save the world
A school, place where you go to LEARN, yet this one has the potential of killing your child!
Udyr will kill her. Trust your instincts instead of rules.

> [{quoted}](name=1100100111010101,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-01T06:19:34.663+0000)
>
> Udyr will kill her. Trust your instincts instead of rules.

Udyr won't be allowed into that school, he has the power of god and stands by his side, thats totally unfair

> [{quoted}](name=Sancre,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-05-01T12:32:54.418+0000)
>
> Udyr won't be allowed into that school, he has the power of god and stands by his side, thats totally unfair

Our rage is beyond your control.
i guess durandal academy is located in america

> [{quoted}](name=kda akali,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dZ6r5LET,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-05-01T20:25:32.182+0000)
>
> i guess durandal academy is located in america

They downvoted the shit out of you but that as funny af

"Assassinate in a a duel"

WAT?
Yeah i thought that shit was wild too
my kitty katarina deservers to be treated like a queen, you god damn right she gets this advantage.
